meaningMnemonic:
For <kanji>year</kanji>s and years, your <kanji>comrade</kanji>s have been with you, but now they're all <vocabulary>elderly</vocabulary>.

This is a less common version of <ja>年配</ja>, but you'll still sometimes encounter it.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. As this vocab is identical to <ja>年配</ja>, it's also read the same. Just remember that the <ja>はい</ja> turns into <ja>ぱい</ja>!
